snippet: Angela Ahrendts will be senior vice president overseeing the strategy and operation of Apple’s retail and online stores, a newly created position.
abstract: Apple hires Burberry chief executive Angela Ahrendts as senior vice president; she will oversee strategy and operation of firm's retail and online stores, newly created position.

byline.original: By BRIAN X. CHEN and MARK SCOTT
byline.contributor: Brian X. Chen reported from San Francisco and Mark Scott from London. Suzy Menkes contributed reporting from London and Claire Cain Miller from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: Angela Ahrendts will be senior vice president overseeing the strategy and operation of Apple’s retail and online stores, a newly created position.

headline.main: Apple Hires Burberry Chief to Polish Image of Online Stores
headline.print_headline: Apple Hires Burberry Chief to Polish Image of Online Stores
